hero.title: Ivan Milinčić
hero.subtitle: Hello! I'm
hero.text: Web developer based in Bulgaria. With a preference for front-end development and ProcessWire CMS. I provide freelance and outsourcing services.

intro.title: Web Design & Development
intro.text: Solutions based on project requirements with the seamless implementation of the user interface and functionality.

custom_websites.subtitle: Website Development
custom_websites.title: Custom Websites
custom_websites.text:
Websites with custom design and functionality, SEO friendly, fast and optimized.
From basic to advanced dynamic websites, webshops, directories...
Long-term solutions, secure and easy to maintain.

services.title: Web Development
services.text: Websites with custom design and functionality, SEO friendly, fast and optimized.

services.title: Outsourcing
services.text: Outsourcing services with long-term support and competitive pricing.

services.title: Coding
services.text: No code generators and visual builders. Semantic, clean and optimized code for best performance and project requirements.

services.title: ProcessWire CMF
services.text: A friendly and powerful open source CMS/CMF for building secure and scalable websites and web apps

services.title: eCommerce
services.text: eCommerce online stores and webshops, based on open-source platforms without limitations, all the features that you need to run your online store.

services.title: Static Websites
services.text: Blazing fast JAMStack websites with nuxt.js, github and netlify...

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.text:
Have an exciting projects and need some help?
You can contact me by email, drop me a message on LinkedIn, or find me on Twitter.
